alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 8:00PM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Warm, dry, and windy conditions continue today and Thursday. Relative humidity will be around 25 percent this afternoon and near 20 percent tomorrow in northeast Kansas and northwest Missouri. Southwesterly wind gusts upwards of 30 to 35 MPH are possible. Burning is discouraged today and Thursday throughout the region.... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT THURSDAY FOR WARM, DRY, AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 012, 025, AND 102... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 025 and 102.Fire weather zone 012. * WIND...Out of the southwest at 20 to 25 mph, with gusts upwards of 35 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity 20 to 25 percent this afternoon. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
